other_tests.findings: Histopathologic picture with a bandlike, dense inflammation composed of abundant neutrophils, nuclear debris, lymphoid cells, and histiocytes with extravasated red blood cells. No blood vessel destruction was seen.
Diagnostic of lupus panniculitis without epidermal alterations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Nodules persisted, new ones appeared, and deep atrophic scars developed on them.
